comment.text: The translation key "Owner" represents the label used to display an owner's name or avatar in a user interface, typically appearing in dialog boxes and info panels. ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Portal sahibi" translates to "Portal owner". While technically correct, "Owner" in this context might imply a more general ownership, not specifically tied to a portal. A more accurate translation could be "Sahibi" or "Malik".
